form.name: aspnetForm

div.h1: All District Buildings are closed until further notice

div.p: Per Governor Wolf's announcement on March 30th, all District facilities are closed until further notice. For more information see the CoronaVirus information page. Student registration will be available on a limited basis, for details click here.

p.strong: Chester County and Delaware County Board of Health Coronavirus Information:

ul.li: Main number: 610-344-6225 (this number routes callers based upon a menu of options)
Please note that the Delaware County map is the most updated map. The PA State Map shows cases before errors are corrected by the County Board of Health.

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,
